description: Triangle read by rows, where row (n) = n mod (n-1), n mod (n-2), n mod (n-3), ...n mod 2.
comments: Central terms: a(2*n+1,n) = n for n > 0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 03 2014Deleting column 1 of the array at A055126 gives the array A051778 in square format (see Example).   - _Clark Kimberling_, Feb 04 2016
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n=3..125 of triangle, flattened
